revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #15 Figy |image = [[File:Figy.png]] |caption = This Berry is oddly shaped, appearing as if someone took a bite out of it. It is packed full of spicy substances. |growtime = 5m 50s |harvest = 14 berries |replant = 30% |points = 40 |flavor =
*15 spicy *0 dry *0 sweet *0 bitter *0 sour }} == Description == '''Figy''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 25, but no more than 80 points of spicy and less than 5 points of all other flavours. [[Cheri]] berries must be unlocked to unlock this berry. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 40 secs || 2 mins 40 secs || 3 mins 50 secs || 5 mins 50 secs - 11 mins 40 secs |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:FigyTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:FigyTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:FigyTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time |- ! None | 5 mins 50 secs -
11 mins 40 secs |- ! Sprayduck | 3 mins 53 secs -
7 mins 47 secs |} == Flow Chart == [[File:Figy_Flow_Chart.png|100px]]
== Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Figy berries. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] |- | [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] || [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] || || [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] || [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] |- style="height: 50px;" | || || || || |- | || [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] || || || [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] |- | [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] || [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] || || [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] || [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] |} {{Berries}}
